page.title: 17SHOPPING IN BARKSTON ASH
page.content: The shop is run by Mrs. Day,it houses the general store, newsagents and Post Office. It is situated in the centre of the village on the main street. On average there are 40 shoppers a day-some merely drop in for a chat, and are mainly adults. The shop opens 6 days a week,not Sundays and half day closing is Thursday. The main articles sold are sweets, newspapers,dairy products and postage. The shop does not sell alcohol. The shop window provides information about forthcoming village events and local announcements. There is no other shop in the village. This means that shopping for family needs is carried out in Leeds 60% and in York 40%.Most shopping is done weekly 70%, fortnightly 25% and monthly 5%. Trade
